text: Sergio Andreoli (born 3 May 1922 in Capranica; died 18 May 2002 in ViterboRoma: addio Andreoli Fu campione nel '42) was an Italian footballer who played as a defender. He played for 6 seasons (179 games, 9 games) in the Serie A for A.S. Roma. He was Roma's captain from 1948 to 1950. ==Honours== ;Roma * Serie A champion: 1941–42. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.C. title: Sergio Andreoli
